value_i18n.en_US: The first step for a complete customer data platform.
Open Square CRM is built to improve customer satisfaction -- managing and nurturing lead, prospect and customer relationships.

Open Square CRM account management provides a 360° view of customers across contracts, activities, products, and status. Account management enables your employees to build tighter relationships by understanding the status of each account.

This CRM is empowered with Sales Force Automation (SFA), Customer Service and Support, Marketing Automation, and analytics modules, and it is ready to integrate with your customer data platform.

Learn More

• Generate new leads
  • Grow your leads
  • Manage the GDPR consents of your contacts
  • Create and manage marketing lists and campaigns
  • High level of configuration
  • Full control of your Accounts and Contacts
  • Manage your Leads
  • Make the most of your sales opportunities
  • Manage your offers and orders even offline from the app thanks to Open Square Sales Mobile
  • Show your sales force key customer information
  • Keep relationships alive
  • Improve sales performance

SMC was established more than 40 years ago to improve our customers' performance. We create real solutions, not just software. We do it using always the most advanced open source developing technologies.


We pay great attention to the user experience and make it easy for our solutions to be introduced and integrated into your company. We are Liferay Platinum Partner, the most reliable and evolved platform for creating business portals.
